column5: Hello everyone, I'm going down to Ecuador in a couple days, I've never really fished salt water before so I'm looking for help. What sorts of tackle would I need to bring down with me? Do I need some sort of license to fish in Ecuador? I appreciate all the help    Thanks!  Aaron

Hi Aaron-I'm in Ecuador right now till April 3rd, I have fished a bit from shore, but its hard to find spots from shore, caught a small Cuda and a few groupers on jigs, I plan on going out in a boat soon, theres some really good salt action offshore.
